root.name: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
root.description: PlotThe game is set to be a prequel to the movies plot and the gameplay is similar to War For Cybertron. The game starts off by thrusting players right into the original prologue storyline of an epic battle between the Autobots and Decepticons that will ultimately lead up to Hot summer Blockbuster Movie hitting the big screen July 1st 2011.The power of 'Stealth Force' is the ability to convert to a third Hybrid or mode that combines the weapons and and firepower of their normal mode with the speed, agility and maneuverability of vehicle mode.GameplayDue to the development team being High Moon, the controls for Dark of the Moon will be the same as their previous game War For Cybertron, this means that the transform button will be mapped the the left stick and driving and shooting will be controlled using the four shoulder buttons.CharactersAutoBotsCharacterXbox360PS3Wii3DSDSOptimus  Moon is working on the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 versions of the game. Behaviour Interactive is working on the Wii, DS and 3DS versions.
